ccol.value: SELECT SUM(Total_BX) FROM dbo.BX_DetailView WHERE GUID_PaymentNumber IN ( SELECT GUID FROM dbo.CN_PaymentNumberView WHERE FunctionClassKey = '01' ) AND GUID_BX_Main IN ( SELECT GUID FROM dbo.BX_Main WHERE DocDate BETWEEN '@SDate' AND '@EDate' and docstate=999 )

SELECT SUM(Total_BX) FROM dbo.BX_DetailView WHERE GUID_PaymentNumber IN ( SELECT GUID FROM dbo.CN_PaymentNumberView WHERE FunctionClassKey = '02' ) AND GUID_BX_Main IN ( SELECT GUID FROM dbo.BX_Main WHERE DocDate BETWEEN '@SDate' AND '@EDate' and docstate=999 )
